sub_title: Neuro- and Head and Neck Radiologist at Erasmus MC and PhD-candidate at Radboudumc
summary:
Ambition: to be an excellent head-and-neck- and neuroradiologist, who is a valuable partner to the clinicians. Both in our care for individual patients and in organization of healthcare. Good patient care is teamwork, looking cross borders!

Keywords: Empathy, creativity, multilingualism, enthusiasm, responsibility, respect, connection, integrity, international collaboration
